comment: The guy seems sweet but not helpful at all except for the extra credit at the end of the year. Class is extremely boring almost to the point you want to cry, no exaggeration.

Very monotone and boring lecture. Never learned anything from class; started not going half way through the semester. Do your online homework & read the textbook. That is the only way you'll pass the class. Some online quizzes which are easy and tests are not terrible but not easy either. Would not recommend him; far easier stats classes at KSU.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: boring guy with a very monotone voice but he is super easy. lets you have a cheat sheet on all test. you get 2 attempt on online quizzes, there is homework online weekly but its helpful, I use the homework to teach myself since I don't pay attn. in class and I make B's and A's on everything but I did take stat in highschool. he's willing to help

Great Professor, especially if you have struggled with statistics in the past.  Straight forward, taught from power points and the book.  He is helpful if you are having trouble and will work with you to make sure you succeed in his class.  I also find it a plus that he works in his field at the CDC and is so nice to his students.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--LECTURE HEAVY
